mapper.insert: insert into member(m_no, m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_email, m_phone, m_nick, m_type, m_status, m_img, m_date) values(member_seq.nextval,#{m_id},#{m_pw},#{m_name},#{m_email},#{m_phone},#{m_nick},#{m_type},#{m_status},'null',sysdate)
insert into address(a_no, m_no, a_road, a_details, a_name, a_addr1, a_addr2) values(address.nextval,#{m_no},#{a_road},#{a_details},'집','null','null')
mapper.select:
select count(*) from member where m_id=#{m_id}
and m_pw=#{m_pw}
mapper.update: update member set m_nick=#{m_nick}, m_email=#{m_email}, m_phone=#{m_phone} where m_id=#{m_id}
